game.name: Monster Rush
game.description:
In this one of the most popular adventure games for boys to play online, you can expect to get fun and thrill in the double amount. Get ready to explore Monster Rush game at least once in your favorite handheld mobile phone device if you cannot believe on our words! This game prepared with the help of html5 technology is also playable on PC, iPhone or iPad devices. All you need to do is just carry a proper gaming device with a proper internet connectivity and all the thrilling hours will be yours. 
Your objective in this cool html5 war game is to stop all the deadly monster attackers from entering your area. Be attentive and place and activate all your defensive towers along the way timely to destroy all your monsters! Do not worry about releasing the weapons from your towers as they will keep attacking the deadly souls once you get them activated! Show off your utmost fighting skills to fight off attacking monsters and zombies in tower defense game!
It is up to you how long Ablett will be able to hold off the monsters. Your quick reaction and strategy skill will help make your way towards the victory in this top mobile fight game. There are 13 different challenging levels to explore combined with the colorful graphics and seamless gameplay. With easy controls, you can keep playing it online for hours. We have an extensive variety of fight games online for free to play here on atmegame.com. Good luck to enjoy more without thinking too much about installing game or download apps!
